# AxisMarkPosition

**Structure**

Describes the position of axis markers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AxisMarkPosition
```

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: automatically places the title.
- **bottom**: A markers at the bottom of the chart
- **leading**: Markers on the leading edge of the chart.
- **top**: A markers at the top of the chart
- **trailing**: Markers on the trailing edge of the chart.

## Supporting types

- **AxisMarkPreset**: Describes preset styles for axis markers.
- **AxisMarkValues**: Describes the values the axis markers will present (one for each value).

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible

items.name: bottom
